sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zuò qiáo yǐjīng jiànchéng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce pont a été construit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This bridge has been built.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè cì kǎoshì de shìtí hěn nán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les questions de cet examen sont très difficiles.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The exam questions are very difficult.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang tīng guǎngbō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'écoute la radio chaque matin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I listen to the radio every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhǎodào le héshì de duìxiàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a trouvé un partenaire convenable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He found a suitable partner.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她学习美术已经五年了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xuéxí měishù yǐjīng wǔ nián le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle étudie les beaux-arts depuis cinq ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She has been studying fine arts for five years.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yuǎnchù chuánlái měimiào de gēshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Un beau chant venait de loin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Beautiful singing came from the distance.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gèwèi tóngxué, qǐng ānjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chers camarades de classe, veuillez vous calmer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Dear classmates, please be quiet.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们要不断改进产品质量。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào bùduàn gǎijìn chǎnpǐn zhìliàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons continuellement améliorer la qualité des produits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to continuously improve product quality.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen de guānxi hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Leur relation est très bonne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Their relationship is very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiānglái wǒ xiǎng dāng yīshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À l'avenir, je veux être médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In the future, I want to be a doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng dàjiā yǒngyuè fāyán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez tous participer activement à la discussion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please everyone actively speak up.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mànman lái, bùyào zhāojí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Prends ton temps, ne te presse pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Take your time, don't rush.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 男子一百米决赛马上开始。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nánzǐ yībǎi mǐ juésài mǎshàng kāishǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La finale du 100 mètres hommes va bientôt commencer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The men's 100-meter final is about to start.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ jìnzhǐ xīyān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est interdit de fumer ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Smoking is prohibited here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zhǎo shíjiān tán yī tán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Trouvons un moment pour discuter.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's find time to have a talk.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā biǎoshì qiángliè fǎnduì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a exprimé une forte opposition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He expressed strong opposition.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng huā bèi chēngwéi méigui.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette fleur s'appelle rose.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This flower is called a rose.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shíjiān hěn jǐn, wǒmen kuài diǎn ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps presse, dépêchons-nous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Time is tight, let's hurry up.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 学好一门语言需要下工夫。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéhǎo yī mén yǔyán xūyào xià gōngfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Maîtriser une langue demande des efforts.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Learning a language well requires effort.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào kèfú kùnnan.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons surmonter les difficultés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must overcome difficulties.
